title: Alan Alda: Why Empathy Can Save Science, Politics and Diplomacy
description: In an interview with Chuck Todd for 1947: The Meet the Press Podcast, Alan Alda explains how he built a second career for himself as a communications expert, and why MAS*H shouldn't be remade for the modern era.
